text: people don't listen to you if you're
nobody if you're a celebrity and you
talk a bit about it it only becomes a
shocking headline it is a very difficult
step to take because it's that career on
the line plus you're dealing with
hundreds of people then throwing their
opinions at you it and it can really
shake a person emotionally I know like
several girls who are new newcomers in
Bollywood struggling going for auditions
who are constantly being discriminated
because of the way they look you know
saying like you know you're too fat or
you know whatever just little comments
that are being made or being hit on or
having phone calls at 2:00 in the
morning from your casting director
things like that which no one is
reporting and nobody is researching
because there's no famous person to
headline it
men have been pretty clueless about the
fact that almost every woman has been
harassed in some way or the other we're
just so numb to it like if you get
touched in a bus or something we don't
even think anymore about it I found that
as soon as I speak about my personal
experiences it becomes a big headline so
I've chosen to steer away from that
because it's too much pressure on me
emotionally
[Music]
I have daily battles that I'm facing
which are just you know like why am I
having to wear this outfit does it
really have anything to do with the plot
is is the scene there for titillating
reasons or to make the plot go forward I
think it's just important that you have
a support group a support group can be
online it can be a therapist it can be
family it can be friends both men and
women need to be having a dialogue with
each other not against each other that's
really important
[Music]
